content: booming mosaic - easy and relaxing pattern with an amazing texture the pattern includes a separate file with the detailed written guide of overlay mosaic crochet basics and links to video tutorials experience level advanced beginner languages & terminology english us deutsch dutch spanish french finnish italian technique overlay mosaic crochet in row pattern repeat 24+3 pattern file size 6 pages the pattern includes detailed written guide of overlay mosaic crochet basics and links to video tutorials a separate file chart with marked x written pattern pattern layout stitches & abbreviations chain/chs chain/chains st/sts stitch/stitches r/rs row/row stsc standing single_crochet single_crochet single_crochet blsc back loop single_crochet bl back loop fldc front loop double_crochet yarn hook & approximate size the booming mosaic pattern sample was created using the following yarn yarn weight #3 light/dk hook size clover amour 4 mm g yarn color a hobbii jarbo cookie candy 46218 color b hobbii mega ball wisteria 34 sample size shape & amount of yarn used for 1 repeat in height x 6 repeats in width without border rectangle width 75 cm/29 5 in x height 11 cm/4 3 in color a 29 g 87 m / 95 yds color b 25 g 75 m / 52 yds you can use any yarn colors & appropriate hook size that suits your project the pattern was created by bebablanket may 2022 the last update august 21 2023 added italian the pattern was tested by mirjam annaars eva vozis tania leis vilma cipriani-ramsey translators dutch mirjam annaars german heidrun liegmann spanish elizabeth
